title: The Blood of the beast = Le sang des betes
creator_credit: Forces et Voix de la France, Paul Le Gros and Georges Franju
brief_description: Classic documentary on a Paris slaughterhouse by Georges Franju which juxtaposes poetry and realism. Narrated by Jean Painleve and photographed by Marcel Fradetal. Music by Joseph Kosma. WARNING: Very graphic footage of animal slaughter.
